txt.en: Khûtra Elder Roshat asks that you search for food for his village.\n\nBerries and wheat can be found to the east of Khûtra.
'My people are hungry. The longer you take the longer they will suffer. Make your way north into the hills and find the elderberries and wheat I requested.'
'My people are hungry. The longer you take the longer they will suffer. Make your way north into the hills and find the elderberries and wheat I requested.'
Collect elderberry bunches ([placeholder]/10)
'My people are hungry. The longer you take the longer they will suffer. Make your way north and east into the plains and find the elderberries and wheat I requested.'
Collected elderberry bunches ([placeholder]/10)
Harvest sheaves of wheat ([placeholder]/6)
Harvested sheaves of wheat ([placeholder]/6)
Return the food to Elder Roshat in Khûtra
Harvest sheaves of wheat ([placeholder]/6)
Return the food to Khûtra Elder Roshat.
'You have my people's thanks. Their bellies will once again be full tonight because of you. You're more resourceful than you look.'
Harvested sheaves of wheat ([placeholder]/6)
Collect elderberry bunches ([placeholder]/10)
Khûtra Elder Roshat asks that you search for food for his village.\n\nBerries and wheat can be found to the east of Khûtra.
Collected elderberry bunches ([placeholder]/10)

'We have more need of supplies, and you've shown a small talent for finding foodstuffs. I wonder if you might find some more food for my village?\n\n'Would you go to the north and collect some elderberries and wheat? The harvesting itself should be easy, but the hills there have many dangers.'
Khûtra Elder Roshat has instructed you to head north from the village into the hills to search for elderberries and wheat. You are to collect them and return to him.
Return the food to Elder Roshat in Khûtra
'You have my people's thanks. Their bellies will once again be full tonight because of you. You're more resourceful than you look.'
Providing Provisions
